DOC.brief_title: Determination Maternal Neonatal Apelinemia Obese Women During Pregnancy
DOC.detailed_description: Background : Apelin receptor APJ implicate pathology include cardiovascular disease , diabetes obesity . Little known function apelinergic system gestation . In previous study , investigator evaluate mice system feto-maternal interface insulin-resistant obese female ( HF ) mouse . Maternal apelinemia decrease term fetal apelinemia sixfold high maternal level . Ex-vivo , placenta release high amount apelin E12.5 E18.5 . In HF pregnant mice term , apelinemia well placental apelin APJ mRNA level increase whereas placental release apelin drastically reduce .
